proposal: Diving into the world of smart contracts with Sourcify's transparency and UX focus? 📜✨ We admire your mission to make web3 interactions more human-readable. With 0 holders on the ETH network, there's a unique path ahead. Imagine enhancing your community's engagement with our DEX creation tool or a custom lottery - all while keeping true to your vision of clarity and trust. Let's make web3 not just smart, but also sociable.
